name: PDFExportPreference

properties.name: effectivePDFDestinationProfile
properties.description: Effective destination color profile. Can return: PDFProfileSelector enumerator or String.

properties.name: effectiveOCRegistry
properties.description: Effective PDF/X OC Registry.

properties.name: effectiveOutputCondition
properties.description: Effective PDF/X output condition.

properties.name: effectivePDFXProfile
properties.description: Effective PDF X color profile. Can return: PDFProfileSelector enumerator or String.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the PDFExportPreference (a Application).

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: pageRange
properties.description: The pages to print, specified either as an enumeration or a string. To specify a range, separate page numbers in the string with a hyphen (-). To specify separate pages, separate page numbers in the string with a comma (,). Can return: PageRange enumerator or String.

properties.name: useSecurity
properties.description: If true, activates security controls for the PDF document.

properties.name: openDocumentPassword
properties.description: The password to enter when opening the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true. Note: A script can set but not get this value.

properties.name: changeSecurityPassword
properties.description: Changes the open document password to the specified string. Valid only when use security is true. Note: A script can set but not get this value.

properties.name: disallowPrinting
properties.description: If true, users cannot print the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: disallowChanging
properties.description: If true, users cannot fill in forms, sign, extract pages, or add comments in the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: disallowCopying
properties.description: If true, users cannot copy and paste text, images, or other content from the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: disallowNotes
properties.description: If true, users cannot add or change notes, edit text, or fill in form fields in the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: disallowFormFillIn
properties.description: If true, users cannot change form fields in the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: disallowExtractionForAccessibility
properties.description: If true, users cannot extract content from the PDF document using software tools for the visually impaired. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: disallowDocumentAssembly
properties.description: If true, users cannot insert, delete, or rotate pages in the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: disallowHiResPrinting
properties.description: If true, users cannot print high-resolution copies of the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: disallowPlaintextMetadata
properties.description: If true and acrobat compatibility is Acrobat 6 or higher, storage systems and search engines cannot access metadata stored in the PDF document. If true and acrobat compatibility is acrobat 5 or higher, users cannot copy and extract content from the document. Valid only when use security is true.

properties.name: viewPDF
properties.description: If true, automatically opens the PDF file after exporting.

properties.name: subsetFontsBelow
properties.description: Sets the threshold for embedding complete fonts based on how many of the fonts' characters are used in the document. If the percentage of characters used in the document for any given font exceeds the specified value, the font is completely embedded; otherwise, the font is subsetted. (Range: 0 to 100) Notes: Embedding complete fonts increases file size. To completely embed all fonts, use 0 (zero).

properties.name: pdfColorSpace
properties.description: The color space to use to represent color information in the exported PDF document.

properties.name: includeICCProfiles
properties.description: The ICC Profiles to include in the exported PDF document. Can also accept: Boolean.

properties.name: omitEPS
properties.description: If true, replaces EPS images with OPI links.

properties.name: omitPDF
properties.description: If true, replaces PDF images with OPI links.

properties.name: omitBitmaps
properties.description: If true, replaces bitmap images with OPI links.

properties.name: cropImagesToFrames
properties.description: If true, image data that falls outside the visible portion of an image's frame is not exported to the PDF document.

properties.name: generateThumbnails
properties.description: If true, generates thumbnail images for each page or spread.

properties.name: optimizePDF
properties.description: If true, optimizes the exported PDF document for faster viewing in a web browser. Note: Compresses text and line art, regardless of specified compression settings.

properties.name: includeStructure
properties.description: If true, creates a tagged PDF file. Note: If acrobat compatibility is acrobat 6 or higher, tags are visible only when the PDF is opened in Acrobat 6 or higher.

properties.name: acrobatCompatibility
properties.description: The exported PDF document's Acrobat compatibility.

properties.name: simulateOverprint
properties.description: If true, simulates the effects of overprinting spot inks with different neutral density values by converting spot colors to process colors for printing. Note: Not valid when the color output mode is defined to leave color profiles unchanged.

properties.name: pdfDestinationProfile
properties.description: The gamut of the final RGB or CMYK device. Can return: PDFProfileSelector enumerator or String.

properties.name: pdfXProfile
properties.description: The PDF X color profile to use for the PDF document. . Can return: PDFProfileSelector enumerator or String.

properties.name: includeHyperlinks
properties.description: If true, includes hyperlinks when exporting the document.

properties.name: includeBookmarks
properties.description: If true, displays bookmarks and table of contents entries as links in the bookmarks pane in the PDF document. If false, no bookmarks are exported.

properties.name: exportNonprintingObjects
properties.description: If true, makes non-printing objects visible in the PDF document.

properties.name: exportGuidesAndGrids
properties.description: If true, includes visible guides and baseline grids in the PDF document.

properties.name: exportLayers
properties.description: If true, saves each layer as an Acrobat layer within the PDF document.

properties.name: standardsCompliance
properties.description: The PDF/X standards compliance to test against.

properties.name: outputCondition
properties.description: The name of the intended printing condition. Valid only when a PDF/X compliance standard has been defined for the document. Not valid when PDF/X-3 is the compliance standard or PDF export preset. For information on compliance standards, see standards compliance and PDF X standards.

properties.name: colorBitmapSampling
properties.description: The sampling option to apply to color bitmap images in the PDF document.

properties.name: colorBitmapSamplingDPI
properties.description: The ppi of the resampled image. (Range: 9 to 2400)

properties.name: colorBitmapCompression
properties.description: The amount of bitmap compression to use.

properties.name: colorBitmapQuality
properties.description: The compression option to apply to color images.

properties.name: grayscaleBitmapSampling
properties.description: The sampling option to apply to grayscale bitmap images.

properties.name: grayscaleBitmapSamplingDPI
properties.description: The ppi of the resampled image. (Range: 9 to 2400)

properties.name: grayscaleBitmapCompression
properties.description: The bitmap compression option to apply to grayscale bitmap images.

properties.name: grayscaleBitmapQuality
properties.description: The compression option to apply to grayscale bitmap images.

properties.name: monochromeBitmapSampling
properties.description: The sampling option to apply to monochrome bitmap images.

properties.name: monochromeBitmapSamplingDPI
properties.description: The ppi of the resampled image. (Range: 9 to 2400)

properties.name: monochromeBitmapCompression
properties.description: The bitmap compression option to apply to monochrome bitmap images.

properties.name: compressTextAndLineArt
properties.description: If true, compresses text and line art using ZIP compression.

properties.name: thresholdToCompressColor
properties.description: The minimum dpi at which color compression is applied. (Range: 1 to 10 times the value specified for color bitmap sampling DPI.)

properties.name: thresholdToCompressGray
properties.description: The minimum dpi at which grayscale compression is applied. (Range: 1 to 10 times the value specified for grayscale bitmap sampling DPI.)

properties.name: thresholdToCompressMonochrome
properties.description: The minimum dpi at which monochrome compression is applied. (Range: 1 to 10 times the value specified for monochrome bitmap sampling DPI.)

properties.name: colorTileSize
properties.description: The tile size for color images. Valid only when color bitmap compression is JPEG 2000. (Range: 128 to 2048)

properties.name: grayTileSize
properties.description: The tile size for grayscale images. Valid only when grayscale bitmap compression is JPEG 2000. (Range: 128 to 2048)

properties.name: compressionType
properties.description: The objects to compress in the PDF document.

properties.name: exportReaderSpreads
properties.description: If true, each spread in the exported document is combined into a single page that has spread's original width.

properties.name: pageMarksOffset
properties.description: The offset from the edge of the page for page marks.

properties.name: cropMarks
properties.description: Prints crop marks that define where the page should be trimmed.

properties.name: pageInformationMarks
properties.description: If true, prints the filename, page number, current date and time, and color separation name.

properties.name: bleedMarks
properties.description: If true, print bleed marks.

properties.name: colorBars
properties.description: If true, add small squares of color representing the CMYK inks and tints of gray in 10% increments.

properties.name: registrationMarks
properties.description: If true, prints small targets outside the page area for aligning color separations.

properties.name: printerMarkWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight for printer's marks.

properties.name: bleedTop
properties.description: The height of the bleed area at the top of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

properties.name: bleedInside
properties.description: The width of the bleed area at the inside of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

properties.name: bleedBottom
properties.description: The height of the bleed area at the bottom of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

properties.name: bleedOutside
properties.description: The width of the bleed area at the outside of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

properties.name: pdfMarkType
properties.description: The type of printer marks, either an enum value or the name of a custom marks file. Can return: MarkTypes enumerator or String.

properties.name: useDocumentBleedWithPDF
properties.description: If true, uses the document's bleed settings in the PDF document.

properties.name: includeSlugWithPDF
properties.description: If true, includes the document's slug area in the PDF document.

properties.name: ignoreSpreadOverrides
properties.description: If true, ignores flattener spread overrides.

properties.name: appliedFlattenerPreset
properties.description: The transparency flattener preset to use.

properties.name: outputConditionName
properties.description: The name of the output condition. Valid only when a PDF/X standard has been defined for the document.

properties.name: ocRegistry
properties.description: The web address for the output condition registry. Not valid when PDF/X-3 is the compliance standard or PDF export preset.

properties.name: interactiveElementsOption
properties.description: How to draw interactive elements.

properties.name: exportWhichLayers
properties.description: Which layers to export.

properties.name: pdfMagnification
properties.description: The export PDF magnification options.

properties.name: pdfPageLayout
properties.description: The export PDF page layout.

properties.name: openInFullScreen
properties.description: Open PDF in full screen mode.

properties.name: pdfDisplayTitle
properties.description: The export PDF display title.

properties.name: defaultDocumentLanguage
properties.description: Sets the default document language in the exported PDF. The correct ISO code of the language must be provided.

properties.name: exportAsSinglePages
properties.description: Export each page or spread as a separate PDF file.

properties.name: singlePagesPDFSuffix
properties.description: Suffix to be used at the end of each file when pages are exported as separate PDF files.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PDFExportPreference.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

description: PDF export settings for the application object.
